name: SHAPES (itch) (ONE EDITOR GAMES)
description:
'SHAPES' is indie developed game by 'One Editor'. It's second game developed by 'One Editor'. 'HARD AF' is tagline of game there are 5 seasons.1. Normal.2.Up is down.3.Move or lose.4.Combined(2,3). This game is playable on 32 bit windows, 64 bit windows, macOSX, Linux
                                                               Music used in game is 'Bush Week' by Nihilore(http://www.nihilore.com/). One Editor games does not own any rights on music.
